name: Titanium.Android.R
summary: The Titanium binding of the native Android R class, giving access to Android system-wide resources or application resources.

properties.name: anim
properties.summary: Animation resources. See R.anim in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: animator
properties.summary: Animator resources. See R.animator in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: array
properties.summary: Array resources. See R.array in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: attr
properties.summary: Attribute resources. See R.attr in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: bool
properties.summary: Boolean resources. See R.bool in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: color
properties.summary: Color resources. See R.color in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: dimen
properties.summary: Dimension resources. See https://developer.android.com/reference/android/R.dimen.html in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: drawable
properties.summary: Drawable resources. See R.drawable in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: fraction
properties.summary: Fraction resources. See R.fraction in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: id
properties.summary: ID resources. See R.id in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: integer
properties.summary: Integer resources. See R.integer in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: interpolator
properties.summary: Interpolator resources. See R.fraction in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: layout
properties.summary: Layout resources. See R.layout in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: menu
properties.summary: Menu resources. See R.menu in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: mipmap
properties.summary: Mipmap resources. See R.mipmap in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: plurals
properties.summary: Plurals resources. See R.plurals in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: raw
properties.summary: Raw resources. See R.raw in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: string
properties.summary: String resources. See R.string in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: style
properties.summary: Style resources. See R.style in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: styleable
properties.summary: Styleable resources. See R.styleable in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: transition
properties.summary: Transition resources. See R.transition in the Android Developer Reference.

properties.name: xml
properties.summary: XML resources. See R.xml in the Android Developer Reference.
